page.title: 06A Day in my Life
page.content: My name is Penny Keeling and I am 9 years old. I get up at 7.OOa.m. and go downstairs for breakfast. I have toast and a drink of lemon juice, then I get into my school dress and get my school bag ready. After that I say goodbye to Mum and Dad and then I go to the bus stop and get on the bus. When I get to school Mr. Palmer calls our names out to see if we are there and then we go to have assembly in a class. After that we do some work like Story and English. At dinner time we can have packed lunches or a hot dinner and we go out to play. In the afternoon we do work or on Monday we do painting, cookery or pottery. In the afternoon after last play we go home. After school I play or watch television. I have tea and I have a bath and go to bed at 8.OOp.m.
